channel.title: test on Nick Coleman
channel.description: Recent content in test on Nick Coleman

item.title: Blog Setup Not Complete
item.description: Setup is not complete, it turns out. I had been using the preview server to view my changes and everything looked fine as in my last post. But when I went to deploy the content over to the live server, I could not get the deployment to work. Most of the styling was missing and the site looked like a terribly brutal minimalist site. I spent an entire afternoon working on it with Github, Gitlab and Netlify, but with no success.

item.title: Starting Out
item.description: This is a new blog using the Hugo static website generator. It’s written in Go, which I don’t know, but it seems pretty easy to use without having to know the ins-and-outs of Go. Let’s go (<ahem>). Test highlighting with some code examples: Bash if i < 10; then i = 10 fi Looks good. Had to change the markdown from two tabs to eight spaces for i = 10 though, otherwise the indentation wasn’t recognised.
